meanings.definition: The time during which school is in session.
meanings.sent1: During schooltime, students learn new things.
meanings.sent2: I have math class during schooltime.
meanings.sent3: At schooltime, the bell rings to start the day.
meanings.sent4: Her mind is a sponge during schooltime, soaking up knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The classroom is full of energy during schooltime.

meanings.definition: The period of time spent at school.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the day is schooltime.
meanings.sent2: We have lunch together during schooltime.
meanings.sent3: During schooltime, the cafeteria smells like delicious food.
meanings.sent4: Schooltime is like a journey through different subjects.
meanings.sent5: The playground is lively during schooltime.
